Member Function Documentation

double ldmx::PnWeightProcessor::calculateFitWp ( double  wp  ) 

Calculate the fitted W_p defined as W_p(fit) = c1*exp(c2*(W_p(measured) - c3)) where c1 = 1.78032e+04 c2 = -8.07561e-03 c3 = 7.91244e+02

Parameters:
wp Measured W_p.
Returns:
W_p(fit)

Definition at line 109 of file PnWeightProcessor.cxx.

Referenced by produce().

00110         return 1.78032e+04*exp(-8.07561e-03*(wp - 7.91244e+02)); 
00111     }

double ldmx::PnWeightProcessor::calculateWp ( SimParticle *  particle  ) 

Calculate the measured W_p defined as W_p(measured) = 0.5*(p_tot + K)*(1.12-0.5*(p_z/p)) where p is the total momentum of the particle K is its kinetic energy p_z is the z component of the momentum all defined at the vertex.

Parameters:
particle SimParticle used to calculate W_p.
Returns:
W_p

Definition at line 113 of file PnWeightProcessor.cxx.

Referenced by produce().

void ldmx::PnWeightProcessor::produce ( Event &  event  )  [virtual]

Run the weight calculation and create a pnWeightResult

Implements ldmx::Producer.

00027                                                 {
00028         result_.Clear();
00029 
00030         // Get the collection of sim particles from the event.  If the 
00031         // collection of sim particles is empty, don't process the
00032         // event.
00033         const TClonesArray *simParticles = event.getCollection("SimParticles");
00034         if (simParticles->GetEntriesFast() == 0) return; 
00035 
00036         // Loop through all of the particles and search for the recoil electron
00037         // i.e. an electron which doesn't have any parents.
00038         SimParticle* recoilElectron{nullptr};
00039         for (int particleCount = 0; particleCount < simParticles->GetEntriesFast(); ++particleCount) { 
00040             
00041             // Get the nth particle from the collection of particles
00042             SimParticle* simParticle = static_cast<SimParticle*>(simParticles->At(particleCount));
00043 
00044             // If the particle doesn't correspond to the recoil electron, 
00045             // continue to the next particle.
00046             if ((simParticle->getPdgID() == 11) && (simParticle->getParentCount() == 0)) {
00047                 //std::cout << "[ pnWeightProcessor ]: Recoil electron found." << std::endl;
00048                 recoilElectron = simParticle; 
00049                 break;
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00053         // Search for the PN gamma and use it to get the PN daughters.
00054         SimParticle* pnGamma{nullptr};
00055         for (int daughterCount = 0; daughterCount < recoilElectron->getDaughterCount(); ++daughterCount) {
00056             SimParticle* daughter = recoilElectron->getDaughter(daughterCount);
00057             if ((daughter->getDaughterCount() > 0) 
00058                 &&(daughter->getDaughter(0)->getProcessType() == 121)) {
00059                 pnGamma = daughter; 
00060                 break;
00061             }
00062         }
00063         
00064         // For PN biased events, there should always be a gamma that 
00065         // underwent a PN reaction.
00066         if (pnGamma == nullptr) return; // throw a runtime exception 
00067         
00068         // Loop over all PN daughters and find the highest energy 
00069         // back-scattered proton(nucleon?).  
00070         SimParticle* nucleon{nullptr};
00071         double keNucleon{0};
00072         double thetaNucleon{0}; 
00073         for (int pnDaughterCount = 0; pnDaughterCount < pnGamma->getDaughterCount(); ++pnDaughterCount) { 
00074             SimParticle* pnDaughter = pnGamma->getDaughter(pnDaughterCount);
00075             double ke = (pnDaughter->getEnergy() - pnDaughter->getMass());
00076             double px = pnDaughter->getMomentum()[0];
00077             double py = pnDaughter->getMomentum()[1];
00078             double pz = pnDaughter->getMomentum()[2];
00079             double p = sqrt(px*px + py*py + pz*pz); 
00080             double theta = acos(pz/p)*180.0/3.14159;
00081             if ((pnDaughter->getPdgID() == 2112) && (ke > keNucleon)) { 
00082                 keNucleon = ke;
00083                 nucleon = pnDaughter;
00084                 thetaNucleon = theta;  
00085             } 
00086         }  
00087 
00088         if (nucleon == nullptr) return; // throw a runtime exception
00089 
00090         // Calculate W_p
00091         double wp = this->calculateWp(nucleon); 
00092 
00093         // 
00094         double weight = 1.0;
00095         double wpFit = 0.0;
00096         if ((wp >= wpThreshold_ ) && (thetaNucleon > 100)) {
00097             wpFit = this->calculateFitWp(wp);  
00098             weight = wpFit/wp; 
00099         } 
00100         //std::cout << "[ pnWeightProcessor ] : PN weight: " << result_.getWeight() << std::endl;
00101     
00102         // Set the resulting weight.
00103         result_.setResult(wpFit, keNucleon, wp, thetaNucleon, weight);
00104 
00105         // Add the result to the collection     
00106         event.addToCollection("pnWeight", result_);
00107     }
